ref: 5061 chēka ʻ clever, shrewd ʼ lex. [Deriv. by H. Berger Zwei Probleme der mittel -- indischen Lautlehre 70 < *śaikva -- ~ śikvá -- ʻ skilful ʼ AV., śíkvan -- RV., śíkvas<-> ʻ able ʼ RV. (not otherwise preserved in MIA. or NIA., with chēka -- already in Pa.), though phonet. possible, is very doubtful]
